Method Detail

init

public void init(ISysConfigManager configManager,
                 String loggerSectionPath)
          throws CSysLoggerException,
                 CSysConfigException
Configure the logger using the ISysConfigItem.

Parameters:
configManager - The configManager that contains the data for initialising the ISysLoggers.
loggerSectionPath - The path in the configuration that contains the ISysLogger data.
Throws:
CSysLoggerException - if a logger can not be added.
CSysConfigException - if the configuration for adding a logger can not be read.

add

public void add(ISysConfigItem configItem)
         throws CSysLoggerException,
                CSysConfigException
Add the ISysLogger.

Parameters:
configItem - The item in the configuration that contains the data for initialising the ISysLogger.
Throws:
CSysLoggerException - if the logger can not be added.
CSysConfigException - if the configuration for adding the logger can not be read.

add

public void add(ISysLogger logger,
                String name)
Add the ISysLogger.

Parameters:
logger - The ISysLogger that has to be added.
name - The name to be used in the get... and remove... method to have access to this ISysLogger.

get

public ISysLogger get(String name)
               throws CSysLoggerException
Get the ISysLogger with the specified name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the ISysLogger.
Returns:
the ISysLogger with the specified name.
Throws:
CSysLoggerException - if a ISysLogger with this name is not registered.

loggers

public Enumeration loggers()
Get an Enumeration of the ISysLoggers that are installed at the manager.

remove

public ISysLogger remove(String name)
Remove the ISysLoggers with the specified name. The logger is not closed!

Parameters:
name - The name of the ISysLogger to be removed.
Returns:
the ISysLoggers that was removed.

clear

public void clear()
Close all ISysLoggers and remove them.

checkerIsSet

public boolean checkerIsSet()
Use this to check if a global log chekcer is set.

Returns:
true if a global log chekcer is set.

setGlobalCheckerEnabled

public void setGlobalCheckerEnabled(boolean enabled)
Set the global log checker enabled/disabled.
This will only work if the global log checker was set before.

Parameters:
enabled - If true the global log checker is enabled.

setGlobalChecker

public void setGlobalChecker(ISysLogChecker checker)
Use this to set the global log checker that has to be used.

Parameters:
checker - The ISysLogChecker to be set.

getGlobalChecker

public ISysLogChecker getGlobalChecker()
Get the current set global checker.

Returns:
the current set log checker or null if no log checker is set.
See Also:
checkerIsSet()

formatterIsSet

public boolean formatterIsSet()
Use this to check if a global log formatter is set.

Returns:
true if a global log formatter is set.

setGlobalFormatterEnabled

public void setGlobalFormatterEnabled(boolean enable)
Set the global log formatter enabled/disabled.
This will only work if the global log formatter was set before.

Parameters:
enable - If true the global log formatter is enabled.

setGlobalFormatter

public void setGlobalFormatter(ISysLogFormatter f)
Use this to set the global formatter that has to be used.

Parameters:
f - The ISysLogFormatter to be set.

getGlobalFormatter

public ISysLogFormatter getGlobalFormatter()
Get the current set global formatter.

Returns:
the current set global log formatter or null if no log formatter is set.
